statement: I reply to guests very quickly
subtext: I often check for messages and answer right away

statement: I make my replies warm and personal
subtext: I use guest names and add helpful information

statement: I make a great first impression
subtext: I know how important this is

statement: I notice if a guest is stressed or relaxed
subtext: I adjust the way I check-in to the mood

statement: I ask questions before I ask for passports
subtext: I welcome guests like friends

statement: I can check-in a guest in 60 seconds
subtext: I timed three normal check-ins

statement: I check in groups differently than FIT
subtext: I usually do this only with the group leader

statement: I don't tell guests our check-in time is 14:00
subtext: Instead I say the room will be finished as soon as possible

statement: I don't show stress when there is a problem
subtext: I know that makes guests will really worry

statement: I show genuine interest during check-out
subtext: I ask about their stay or next destination

statement: I make great last impressions
subtext: I help with bags and wait until the car is gone

statement: I use names to connect with guests
subtext: When the mood is right I tell my name and use theirs

statement: I scan every guest every time
subtext: I don't look at a group but at each individual

statement: I am good at scanning
subtext: I see what people need before they ask

statement: I create unique surprises for guests
subtext: I do more than offering free things

statement: Music is an essential part of the vibe
subtext: I really listen to make sure we play the right music

statement: I invite guests to share other BED facilities
subtext: I offer downtown coffee, bigger pool or breakfast

statement: its really annoying when the room key doesn't work
subtext: I always go with the guest to make sure the new one works

statement: I talk with guests because I am interested
subtext: When I force myself it will not be genuine

statement: I often give my friends honest feedback
subtext: I’m happy to help them to grow

statement: My friends often give me honest feedback
subtext: I’m happy they help me to grow

statement: I can answer most questions about BED
subtext: I have visited the rooms in all our hotels

statement: I understand the meaning of "showtime"
subtext: Its the time that the real magic happens

statement: I know the story of "peeling the onion"
subtext: Most of the time I don't act but I show my true self

statement: I never gossip. I signed “I Promise”
subtext: I don't talk bad when someone's not here

statement: I really understand that rules can be flexible
subtext: Without reasons many rules just disappear

statement: I am confident about my own judgment
subtext: I make decisions without asking permission

statement: I look after the whole hotel, not just my own area
subtext: I share responsibility for rooms and public areas

statement: I look around when i arrive at the hotel
subtext: I share responsibility for the hotel surroundings

statement: I don't give problems to others but act myself
subtext: Later I follow up to make sure it's solved

statement: I am not afraid of my CEO or coach
subtext: I know I am allowed to make mistakes

statement: I have no manuals that show me what to do
subtext: That means I cannot do anything wrong
